raw.title: [ARFC] Onboard BNBx to Aave V3 BNB Chain
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [ARFC] Onboard BNBx to Aave V3 BNB Chain
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-05-27

---

### **Summary**
This ARFC proposes the addition of BNBx from Stader to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

BNBx is a liquid staked token of BNB from Stader. Users can freely mint BNBx in exchange for BNB deposits and earn yield from staking.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract address: [0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275](https://bscscan.com/token/0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275)

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | No |
| Borrowable | Yes |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (BNBx) | 5,000 |
| Borrow Cap (BNBx) | 500 |
| Debt Ceiling | NA |
| LTV | 65.00% |
| LT | 70.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 7.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00% |
| Variable Base | 0.0% |
| Variable Slope1 | 7.00% |
| Variable Slope2 | 300.00% |
| Uoptimal | 45.00% |
| Reserve Factor | 15.00% |
| Stable Borrowing | Disabled |
| Flahloanable  | Yes |
| Siloed Borrowing | No |
| Borrowed in Isolation | No |

Risk Parameters have been provided by Risk Service Providers and ARFC has been updated.

## **Useful Links**

- Website: https://www.staderlabs.com/
- BNBx docs: https://binance.docs.staderlabs.com/
- [TEMP CHECK](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-bnbx-on-aave-v3-bnb-chain/16850)
- [TEMP CHECK Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x9510ea1d3c9fd0f1fd67b05860ca2f1dafb65b983ff1f81d962b7dea0c47b13b)

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this ARFC on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
2. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.title: [ARFC] Add sFRAX on Ethereum V3
raw.author: 0xe2D6AA050C655a3F0f95eFD8F2107778090308aE
raw.body:
Title: [ARFC] Add sFRAX on Ethereum V3

Author: @0xlide, @SaucyBlock and ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

Date: 2024-01-18

# Summary
This publication presents the community an opportunity to add sFRAX to the Ethereum Aave V3 Liquidity Pool.

# Motivation
Staked FRAX (sFRAX) is an ERC-4626 staking vault that distributes a portion of the Frax Protocol yield. sFRAX APY attempts to roughly track the interest on reserve balances (IORB) rate of the United States Federal Reserve.

Integrating sFRAX as collateral asset in the Aave V3 Ethereum Pool has the potential to create new demand for borrowable assets on Aave V3, such as stablecoins and FXS.

# Specification

Ticker: sFRAX
Contract Adress: 0xA663B02CF0a4b149d2aD41910CB81e23e1c41c32
Chainlink Oracle: 0xB9E1E3A9feFf48998E45Fa90847ed4D467E8BcfD


| Parameter               | Recommendation |
|-------------------------|----------------|
| Isolation Mode          | NO             |
| Borrowable in Isolation | NO             |
| Stable Borrow           | NO             |
| Enable Borrow           | NO             |
| Enable Collateral       | YES            |
| Loan To Value           | 70.00%         |
| Liquidation Threshold   | 75.00%         |
| Liquidation Bonus       | 6.00%          |
| Reserve Factor          | 20.00%         |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee| 20.00%         |
| Supply Cap(sFRAX)       | 10.00M         |
| Borrow Cap(sFRAX)       | N/A            |
| Uoptimal                | N/A            |
| Base                    | N/A            |
| Slope1                  | N/A            |
| Slope2                  | N/A            |


# Next Steps
1. If consensus on ARFC stage is reached and risk service providers provide feedback on risk parameters, escalate to ARFC snapshot stage.
2. If ARFC snapshot stage outcome is YAE, escalate to AIP stage

# Disclaimer
ACI is not presenting this ARFC on behalf of any third party and are not compensated by any entity for creating this ARFC.

# Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived via CC0.

raw.title: [ARFC] Onboard sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
### [ARFC]  Onboard sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum 

### Author:  ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

### Date: 2024-04-01

---

### **Summary**

This is an ARFC to seek approval for the addition of sUSDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum, following the consensus reached in the [TEMP CHECK](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x3263dbee34f5afe513a1a6c5bcd5207684cee03473e1b3d7616993dbd87ab881) stage.

### **Motivation**

As discussed in the TEMP CHECK, Ethena's synthetic dollar, USDe, provides a stable crypto-native solution for a cash and carry structured product. The staked version of USDe, sUSDe, earns yield from the protocol and has high potential for strong borrow demand. 

### **Specification**

sUSDe: [0x9d39a5de30e57443bff2a8307a4256c8797a3497](https://etherscan.io/token/0x9d39a5de30e57443bff2a8307a4256c8797a3497)

### Risk Parameters

Risk parameters have been provided by Chaos Labs in the ARFC discussion thread. 

Initial Risk Parameters are the following:

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | Yes |
| Borrowable | No |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (sUSDe) | 85M |
| Debt Ceiling |40M |
| LTV | 72.00% |
| LT | 75.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 8.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00%|
|Flashloanable|No|
|Siloed Borrowing|No|
|Borrowed in Isolation|No|
|Emode|No|

### **Useful Links**

[TEMP CHECK](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/16840)
[TEMP CHECK Snapshot](https://snapshot.org/#/aave.eth/proposal/0x3263dbee34f5afe513a1a6c5bcd5207684cee03473e1b3d7616993dbd87ab881)

### Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Ethena and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

### **Next Steps**

1. Collect community & service providers feedback on this ARFC.
2. Escalate the proposal to ARFC snapshot stage if feedback is positive.
3. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
### [ARFC]  Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain

### Author:  ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)

### Date: 2024-04-02

---

### **Summary**

This ARFC proposes the addition of wbETH the Binance Liquid Staked ETH Token to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

Liquid Staked Tokens are one of the premier collateral types on Aave and drive most of the ETH borrow demand. wBETH is one of the largest Liquid Staking Tokens on the market and one of the more productive assets available on BNB Chain.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

wbETH: [0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1](https://bscscan.com/token/0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1)

## Risk parameters

These initial risk parameters have been suggested by Chaos Labs.

| Risk Parameters | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | No |
| Borrowable | Yes |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (wbETH) | 3,000 |
| Borrow Cap (wbETH) | 300 |
| Debt Ceiling | NA |
| LTV | 67.00% |
| LT | 74.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 7.00% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00% |
| Variable Base | 0.0% |
| Variable Slope1 | 7.00% |
| Variable Slope2 | 300.00% |
| Uoptimal | 45.00% |
| Reserve Factor | 15.00% |
| Stable Borrowing | Disabled |
| Stable Slope1 | 13.00% |
| Stable Slope2 | 300.00% |
| Base Stable Rate Offset | 3.00% |
| Stable Rate Excess Offset | 5.00% |
| Optimal Stable To Total Debt Ratio | 20.00% |
| Flahloanable  | No |
| Siloed Borrowing | No |
| Borrowed in Isolation | No |

CAPO

| maxYearlyRatioGrowthPercent | ratioReferenceTime | MINIMUM_SNAPSHOT_DELAY |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 8.66% | monthly | 14 days |

## Useful links:

Website: https://www.binance.com/en/ethereum-staking

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this ARFC on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this ARFC, escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
Title: [ARFC] Onboard USDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum 
Date: 2024-05-13
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
---

### Summary:

This is an ARFC to seek approval for the addition of USDe to Aave V3 on Ethereum, as there’s been already a successful onboarding for sUSDe (staked USDe)  on Ethereum.

### **Motivation**

Ethena’s synthetic dollar, USDe, provides a stable crypto-native solution for a cash and carry structured product. The staked version of USDe, sUSDe, earns yield from the protocol and has high potential for strong borrow demand, which was already onboarded successfully into Aave. 

The current ARFC plans to onboard USDe on Aave v3 Ethereum.

### **Specification**

USDe: (0x4c9edd5852cd905f086c759e8383e09bff1e68b3)
[Etherscan link](https://etherscan.io/token/0x4c9edd5852cd905f086c759e8383e09bff1e68b3)

### Risk Parameters

ARFC has been updated with Risk parameters provided by Risk Service Providers in the ARFC discussion thread.

| Parameter | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Isolation Mode | Yes |
| Borrowable | Yes |
| Collateral Enabled | Yes |
| Supply Cap (USDe) | 80M |
| Borrow Cap (USDe) | 72M |
| UOptimal | 80% |
| Slope1 | 9.00% |
| Slope2 | 75.00% |
| Debt Ceiling | $40M |
| LTV | 72.00% |
| LT | 75.00% |
| Liquidation Bonus | 8.50% |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10.00% |

### **Useful Links**

[[TEMP CHECK] Onboard sUSDe to Aave v3 Ethereum](https://governance.aave.com/t/temp-check-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/16840)

[[ARFC] Onboard sUDe to Aave v3 on Ethereum](https://governance.aave.com/t/arfc-onboard-susde-to-aave-v3-on-ethereum/17191/6)

### Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards. The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Ethena and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

### **Next Steps**

1. Collect community & service providers feedback on this ARFC.
2. Escalate the proposal to ARFC snapshot stage if feedback is positive.
3. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal.

### Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived under [CCO](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

decision.summary: The proposal to onboard USDC.e to Aave V3 on Gnosis Chain is strongly supported by voting timeline analytics, risk assessments from trusted providers, and the majority of forum discussion sentiment. Historical similar proposals for onboarding new assets with similar parameters have passed with strong consensus and led to stable or positive TVL outcomes.
key_arguments_for: USDC.e follows Circle's Bridged USDC Standard, allowing future upgrade to native USDC and enhanced interoperability with Circle products like CCTP.
Risk Service Providers and ChaosLabs recommend onboarding with risk parameters aligned to existing stablecoins on Gnosis, indicating low incremental risk.
The migration improves capital efficiency and user experience by standardizing bridged USDC tokens and enabling smoother cross-chain transfers.
Similar past proposals onboarded assets with stable or increasing TVL post-vote, indicating successful integration without adverse effects.
key_arguments_against: Current liquidity of USDC.e is low, concentrated mostly in a single Balancer pool, raising concerns about initial market depth.
There is a risk that incentive programs to attract liquidity might draw short-term yield seekers leading to capital withdrawals post-incentives.
Bridge contract and validator risks remain similar to the previously onboarded USDC asset, though mitigated by multisig governance and bug bounties.
Forum discussion shows some negative sentiment and caution about the migration's immediate impact and risks.

evidence.quote: Majority comments support the onboarding citing improved interoperability and risk assessments; some negative comments raise liquidity and bridge risks.
Voting timeline shows a consistent and stable lead for 'YAE' choice with full early ratio and stability metrics at 1.0.
Past onboarding proposals with similar parameters passed with strong YAE majorities and stable or positive TVL outcomes.

decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- Voting analytics show a stable and unanimous lead for YAE, indicating strong voter consensus.
- Forum sentiment mostly supports onboarding due to improved interoperability and risk assessments, despite some liquidity and bridge risk concerns.
- Historical lessons from similar past proposals demonstrate successful onboarding without negative TVL or token price impacts.
- Market impact shows modest TVL growth, supporting the proposal's long-term benefit.
- The recommendation aligns well with aggregated forum sentiment, reflecting the community's informed position.
